action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of four distinct shapes arranged in a 2x2 grid. The top left shape is a green square with a purple cross in the center. The top right shape is a green square with a pink square in the center. The bottom left shape is an orange square with a smaller orange square in the bottom right corner. The bottom right shape is a green square with a smaller green square in the bottom right corner.
continue
